description:
Instantly search for the best product price.  Search for any item and view prices from both online and local stores.  Results include item and store reviews as well as product descriptions.  For online stores, tap to navigate to the website or send the URL link via SMS or email. For local stores, tap for easy driving directions or to call the store. 

Extra features include search correction, custom sorting and product pictures.  Don’t go shopping without Price Cloud. Make sure you are getting the best deal!
